key.name: development-tools
key.summary: Enable internal tools useful for developers and testers from Alt-F2
key.description: Allows access to internal debugging and monitoring tools using the Alt-F2 dialog.

key.name: enabled-extensions
key.summary: UUIDs of extensions to enable
key.description: GNOME Shell extensions have a UUID property; this key lists extensions which should be loaded. Any extension that wants to be loaded needs to be in this list. You can also manipulate this list with the EnableExtension and DisableExtension D-Bus methods on org.gnome.Shell.

key.name: disable-extension-version-validation
key.summary: Disables the validation of extension version compatibility
key.description: GNOME Shell will only load extensions that claim to support the current running version. Enabling this option will disable this check and try to load all extensions regardless of the versions they claim to support.

key.name: favorite-apps
key.summary: List of desktop file IDs for favorite applications
key.description: The applications corresponding to these identifiers will be displayed in the favorites area.

key.name: app-picker-view
key.summary: App Picker View
key.description: Index of the currently selected view in the application picker.

key.name: command-history
key.summary: History for command (Alt-F2) dialog

key.name: looking-glass-history
key.summary: History for the looking glass dialog

key.name: always-show-log-out
key.summary: Always show the 'Log out' menu item in the user menu.
key.description: This key overrides the automatic hiding of the 'Log out' menu item in single-user, single-session situations.

key.name: remember-mount-password
key.summary: Whether to remember password for mounting encrypted or remote filesystems
key.description: The shell will request a password when an encrypted device or a remote filesystem is mounted. If the password can be saved for future use a 'Remember Password' checkbox will be present. This key sets the default state of the checkbox.

key.name: show-weekdate
key.summary: Show the week date in the calendar
key.description: If true, display the ISO week date in the calendar.

key.name: open-application-menu
key.summary: Keybinding to open the application menu
key.description: Keybinding to open the application menu.

key.name: toggle-application-view
key.summary: Keybinding to open the "Show Applications" view
key.description: Keybinding to open the "Show Applications" view of the Activities Overview.

key.name: toggle-overview
key.summary: Keybinding to open the overview
key.description: Keybinding to open the Activities Overview.

key.name: toggle-message-tray
key.summary: Keybinding to toggle the visibility of the notification list
key.description: Keybinding to toggle the visibility of the notification list.

key.name: focus-active-notification
key.summary: Keybinding to focus the active notification
key.description: Keybinding to focus the active notification.

key.name: pause-resume-tweens
key.summary: Keybinding that pauses and resumes all running tweens, for debugging purposes

key.name: keyboard-type
key.summary: Which keyboard to use
key.description: The type of keyboard to use.

key.name: current-workspace-only
key.summary: Limit switcher to current workspace.
key.description: If true, only applications that have windows on the current workspace are shown in the switcher. Otherwise, all applications are included.

key.name: app-icon-mode
key.summary: The application icon mode.
key.description: Configures how the windows are shown in the switcher. Valid possibilities are 'thumbnail-only' (shows a thumbnail of the window), 'app-icon-only' (shows only the application icon) or 'both'.

key.name: current-workspace-only
key.summary: Limit switcher to current workspace.
key.description: If true, only windows from the current workspace are shown in the switcher. Otherwise, all windows are included.

key.name: attach-modal-dialogs
key.summary: Attach modal dialog to the parent window
key.description: This key overrides the key in org.gnome.mutter when running GNOME Shell.

key.name: edge-tiling
key.summary: Enable edge tiling when dropping windows on screen edges
key.description: This key overrides the key in org.gnome.mutter when running GNOME Shell.

key.name: dynamic-workspaces
key.summary: Workspaces are managed dynamically
key.description: This key overrides the key in org.gnome.mutter when running GNOME Shell.

key.name: workspaces-only-on-primary
key.summary: Workspaces only on primary monitor
key.description: This key overrides the key in org.gnome.mutter when running GNOME Shell.

key.name: focus-change-on-pointer-rest
key.summary: Delay focus changes in mouse mode until the pointer stops moving
key.description: This key overrides the key in org.gnome.mutter when running GNOME Shell.
